00036 template<typename Point, typename T>
00037 Point newRandomPoint(T Min, T Max)
00038 {
00039   double d;
00040   double e;
00041   double f;
00042   Point a;
00043   double max, min;
00044   max = (double) Max;
00045   min = (double) Min;
00046   for(unsigned int i=0;i < Point::__DIM;++i)
00047     {
00048       d = drand48();
00049       if(min > 0)
00050         {
00051           e = (d*max)-(d*min);
00052           f = min;
00053         }
00054       else
00055         {
00056           e = (d*max)+min;
00057           f = -(d*min);
00058         }
00059       
00060       a[i] = (T) (e+f);
00061     }
00062   return a;
00063 }

00065 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00066 bool testNN(unsigned int Size, unsigned int k, T min, T max)
00067 {
00068   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00069   std::vector<Point> data;
00070   std::vector<Point> query;
00071   std::vector<long unsigned int> sfcnn_ans;
00072   std::vector<long unsigned int> bf_ans;
00073 
00074   data.resize(Size);
00075   query.resize(Size);
00076   
00077   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00078     {
00079       data[i]  = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(min, max);
00080       query[i] = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(min, max);
00081     }
00082 
00083   bruteNN<Point> BF(&data[0], data.size());
00084   sfcnn<Point, DIM, T> SFC(&data[0], data.size());
00085 
00086   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00087     {
00088       BF.ksearch(query[i], k, bf_ans);
00089       SFC.ksearch(query[i], k, sfcnn_ans); 
00090       
00091       for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00092         {
00093           if(bf_ans[j] != sfcnn_ans[j])
00094             return false;
00095         }
00096     }
00097   return true;
00098 }

00100 template<unsigned DIM>
00101 bool testGMST(unsigned int Size)
00102 {
00103   typedef reviver::dpoint<double, DIM> Point;
00104   typedef std::pair<typename std::vector<Point>::size_type, typename std::vector<Point>::size_type> Edge;
00105 
00106   std::vector<Point> data;
00107   std::vector<Edge> ans;
00108   std::vector<Edge> bfans;
00109 
00110   data.resize(Size);
00111   for(int i=0;(unsigned int) i < data.size();++i)
00112     {
00113       data[i]  = newRandomPoint<Point, double>(0, 1);
00114     }
00115 
00116   gmst(data, ans);
00117   bfgmst(data, bfans);
00118   
00119   double dist1=0, dist2=0;
00120   for(int i=0;i < (int) ans.size();++i)
00121     {
00122       dist1+= data[ans[i].first].sqr_dist(data[ans[i].second]);
00123       dist2+= data[bfans[i].first].sqr_dist(data[bfans[i].second]);
00124     }
00125   return dist1==dist2;
00126   
00127 }
00128 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00129 bool testKNNG(unsigned int Size, unsigned int k, T min, T max, int num_threads)
00130 {
00131   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00132   std::vector<Point> data;
00133   std::vector<long unsigned int> bf_ans;
00134 
00135   data.resize(Size);
00136   
00137   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00138     {
00139       data[i]  = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(min, max);
00140     }
00141 
00142   bruteNN<Point> BF(&data[0], data.size());
00143   sfcnn_knng<Point, DIM, T> SFC(&data[0], data.size(), k, num_threads);
00144 
00145   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00146     {
00147       BF.ksearch(data[i], k+1, bf_ans);
00148       for(unsigned int j=1;j < k+1;++j)
00149         {
00150           if(bf_ans[j] != SFC[i][j-1])
00151             return false;
00152         }
00153     }
00154   return true;
00155 }

00157 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00158 bool testZLT(T Min, T Max)
00159 {
00160   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00161 
00162   Point min, max, random;
00163   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00164 
00165   for(unsigned i = 0; i < DIM;++i)
00166     {
00167       min[i]=Min;
00168       max[i]=Max;
00169     }
00170   random = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(Min, Max);
00171   while((random == min) || (random == max))
00172     {
00173       random = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(Min, Max);
00174     }
00175 
00176   if(lt(max, min)) return false;
00177   if(lt(random, min)) return false;
00178   if(lt(max, random)) return false;
00179   if(!lt(min, max)) return false;
00180   if(!lt(min, random)) return false;
00181   if(!lt(random, max)) return false;
00182   return true;
00183 }

00185 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00186 bool testSORT(unsigned int Size, T Min, T Max)
00187 {
00188   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00189   std::vector<Point> points;
00190   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00191 
00192   for(unsigned int i=0;i < Size;++i)
00193     {
00194       points.push_back(newRandomPoint<Point, T>(Min, Max));
00195     }
00196   sort(points.begin(), points.end(), lt);
00197 
00198   for(unsigned int i=0;i < Size-1;++i)
00199     {
00200       if(!lt(points[i], points[i+1])) return false;
00201     }
00202   return true;
00203 }
